Translations.Text: When your Lord took out from the loins of the children of Adam all their descendants, He called upon them to bear witness about themselves, "Am I not your Lord?" To which they answer, "Yes, we bear witness of this." [We remind you of this] so that on the Day of Resurrection, you do not say, "We were unaware of this

or so that you do not say, "It was our forefathers who began to ascribe divinity to other beings beside God and we were only their children. Will You destroy us because of the falsehoods they invented
We clearly spell out these messages and [We do it] so that they [those who have sinned] might return [to Us]
Tell them the story of the man to whom We gave Our messages and who then cast them aside: Satan catches up with him and he strays, into error

Had We so willed, We could have used those [messages] to raise him high but he always clung to the earth and followed his own desires. He was like a dog-who pants with his tongue hanging out whether you drive him away or leave him alone. That's the image of those who reject Our messages. Tell this story so that they might reflect on it
The people who reject Our messages are an example of evil, for It is against themselves that they are sinning
Only He whom God guides is truly guided, whereas those whom He lets go astray are the losers

There are many jinn and men who have hearts that fail to grasp the truth. We have destined for Hell, those whose eyes fail to see and whose ears fail to hear. They are like cattle. No, they are even less mindful of the right path. It is they who are [truly] oblivious
The Most Beautiful Names belong to God: use them to call on Him and avoid those who take His name in vain. They will be punished for all that they do
Among those whom We created, there are people who guide [others] in the way of the Truth and act justly in its light
